word_mean: 软膏：供身体外用的半固体制剂，通常都含有一种药物
将药物、药材细粉、药材提取物与适宜基质混合制成的半固体外用制剂。

sentence.Network_en: We put some ointment and a bandage on his knee.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在他的膝盖上涂了些药膏并打上了绷带。

sentence.Network_en: Your foot will feel better after the application of this ointment.
sentence.Network_cn: 敷用这药膏后,你的脚会感到舒服些.

sentence.Network_en: The surgeon applied some ointment to my burnt fingers.
sentence.Network_cn: 外科医生在我烧伤的指头上敷了一些药膏.

人教版高中英语必修5单词 - 豆丁网 ... n. in place 在适当的位置；适当 ointment 要高；油膏 n. infection 传染；传染病；感染.
（10）软膏剂（Ointment）：系药物与适宜的基质均匀混合制成的一种易于涂布在皮肤或粘膜上的半固体外用制剂，如白降汞软膏。 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: alteration of Old French oignement, from a popular Latin form of Latin unguentum (see unguent); influenced by obsolete oint 'anoint' (from Old French, past participle of oindre 'anoint')

entry.def: An ointment is a smooth thick substance that is put on sore skin or a wound to help it heal.

example.ex: A range of ointments and creams is available for the treatment of eczema...
example.tran: 有一系列治疗湿疹的油膏和乳膏可以买到。

example.ex: He received ointment for his flaking skin.
example.tran: 医生给他开了治疗脱皮的软膏。

entry.tran: 美中不足之处；败兴的人（或事物）；煞风景的人（或事物）
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as a fly in the ointment, you think they spoil a situation and prevent it being as successful as you had hoped.

example.ex: Rachel seems to be the one fly in the ointment of Caroline's smooth life.
example.tran: 蕾切尔似乎是卡罗琳一帆风顺的生活中唯一的麻烦。

means.word_mean: 1. semisolid preparation (usually containing a medicine) applied externally as a remedy or for soothing an irritation
2. toiletry consisting of any of various substances resembling cream that have a soothing and moisturizing effect when applied to the skin

auth_sentence.content: You might want to put some ointment on that.
auth_sentence.res_content: You might want to put some ointment on that.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You might want to put some ointment on that.

auth_sentence.content: There is one small fly in the ointment though - the sun.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is one small fly in the ointment though - the sun.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is one small fly in the ointment though - the sun.

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, the only fly in the ointment here is the character Boo.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, the only fly in the ointment here is the character Boo.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, the only fly in the ointment here is the character Boo.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具体物"; 2. 表名词,"行为或结果等"

embank筑堤+ment具体物→n.堤防,筑堤
equip装备+ment具体物→n.设备,器材,装置;才能
gar装饰3+ment表名词→装饰的东西,衣服
nourish提供养分+ment具体物→n.食物,营养品
oint=oil油+ment具体物→n.油膏,软膏
pave铺路+ment具体物→n.人行道
seg切,割+ment具体物→n.段,片,节,部分
achieve完成,达到+ment行为或结果等→n.成就,功绩
argu+ment行为或结果等→n.争论,辩论,论据
command命令+ment行为或结果等→n.戒律

embezzle盗用+ment行为或结果等→n.贪污,侵吞
embody体现+ment行为或结果等→embodiment
enact实施,颁布+ment行为或结果等→n.设定,制定

govern统治,支配+ment行为或结果等→n.政府
harass烦恼+ment行为或结果等→n.骚扰,扰乱;烦恼,烦乱

sentences.en: This herbal ointment will help to close up your wound quickly.
sentences.cn: 这种中草药膏会帮助你的伤口很快愈合。

means.word_mean: 扫兴的人；煞风景的事物

sentences.en: We lead a very happy life here. The only fly in the ointment is that there’s too much traffic on our road.
sentences.cn: 我们在这儿过得很快活，唯一美中不足的就是住处马路上的车辆太多了。
